places.name: The Foolery
places.notes: Detroit style pizza and amazing appetizers. A great place to hang out with friends. Cheap PBRs always.
places.address: 10 Ionia Ave NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49503
places.parking: Street parking available - but it's downtown. Best to walk.

places.name: Barrio
places.notes: A vibrant Mexican restaurant known for its tacos and tequila selection. This place gets packed before events at Van Andel Arena or the GLC
places.parking: Street parking available, but it's best to walk if you're downtown.
places.address: Brush Studio, 11, Ionia Avenue Northwest, Grand Rapids, Kent County, Michigan, 49503, United States
